title: Error when changing due date
body:
**What version of Invoice Ninja are you running? Latest
**What environment are you running? dedicated hosting


The incoice was partial payed, i wanted to extend the pay date
i had to wait or the products and the delivery date is changed




** Error? 
Deserializing '[message, This invoice is locked and unable to be modified]' to 'minified:xR' failed due to: Tried to build class "InvoiceItemResponse" but nested builder for field "data" threw: Tried to construct class "InvoiceEntity" with null field "amount". This is forbidden; to allow it, mark "amount" with @nullable.

title: French translation has changed in net/subtotal/total labels with wrong text
body:
## Setup
- Version: 5.11.41
- Environment: Docker

## Interface
- Flutter: []
- React: [X]
- Both: []

## Checklist
- Can you replicate the issue on our v5 demo site https://demo.invoiceninja.com or https://react.invoicing.co/demo?
--> tried on the react demo version, putting the interface in FR, but emails previews are still in english without the problem
- Have you searched existing issues? YES
- Have you reported this to Slack/forum before posting? NO
- Have you inspected the logs in storage/logs/laravel.log for any errors? YES, no errors related

## Describe the bug
Since the last update (or the 2 last update, don't remember), in the PDF invoice/quotes generated, the french labels for Net and subtotal are now wrong.
They are "Filet" for net (which seems to be a google translate of a net to catch insects!), "Total" for subtotal.

I don't even find this word "filet" in the fr translation file.

Here is a correct quote generated in the beginning of february (my docker is updated maximum one week after each new image):
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/1576250d-3429-4c8e-b8bb-8ed8b56075cc)

And here is the same quote preview now:
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/4972bd28-e0b2-4a88-abf2-96ce55c66f01)

### Steps To Reproduce
Open existing invoice/quote or create new one and check the pdf preview.

### Expected Behavior
Labels should be like before:
 - Net
 - Sous-total
 - Total

title: show negative custom surcharge
body:
**What version of Invoice Ninja are you running? ie v4.5 / v5**
v5.3.96-M84
**What environment are you running?**
Docker
**Have you searched existing issues/requests?**
yes

I'm using the custom surcharge field to round the invoices, most oftentimes giving a few cents to the customer and rounding the amount to the integer.

while positive surcharge are correctly shown on the details, surcharges <= 0 aren't displayed.
it would be great to permit showing the negative surcharge custom field (that I called rounding) on the detail of the total.

Otherwise if it's too complicated, it would be nice to point me to another feature that would permit me to do the rounding.

title: Document upload doesn't work at Project level
body:
**What version of Invoice Ninja are you running? 
v5.0.56

**What environment are you running?**
Self-hosted, installed with git

**Have you checked log files (storage/logs/) Please provide redacted output**
Nothing relevant in .error.log

**Have you searched existing issues?**
No issue found when searching for "upload"

**Have you reported this to Slack/forum before posting?**
No. Should I? (sorry, not aware of Slack/forum)

**Describe the bug**
In a given Project window, uploading a document completes with message "Successfully uploaded document", but the document doesn't show up. It does work on Task level. 

**Steps To Reproduce**
- Select a Project
- Select Documents tab
- Click on Upload File and ... upload a file

**Expected behavior**
Document should show up

**Screenshots**
No screenshot necessary, I think

title: Registration page not working after fresh install
body:
<!-- Before posting please check our "Troubleshooting" category in the docs: 
https://invoiceninja.github.io/docs/self-host-troubleshooting/ -->

## Setup
- Version: `v5.5.63-C105`
- Environment: `docker`

## Checklist
- Can you replicate the issue on our v5 demo site https://demo.invoiceninja.com or https://react.invoicing.co/demo?
  - No
- Have you searched existing issues?
  - Yes
- Have you reported this to Slack/forum before posting?
  - No, but there's already this post: https://forum.invoiceninja.com/t/registration-page-not-working/10024
- Have you inspected the logs in storage/logs/laravel.log for any errors?
  - Yes

## Describe the bug
Register client page is broken after fresh install with docker-compose

### Steps To Reproduce
- Setup docker-compose
- Setup new company
- Enable client registration (settings for required fields missing)
- Try to go to `/client/register`
- No form is shown, just two buttons
- Register button redirects to login with header error `Login disabled`

### Expected Behavior
Client registration should work

## Additional context
The workaround described in the linked forum thread works:
```
mysql> select client_registration_fields from companies;
+----------------------------+
| client_registration_fields |
+----------------------------+
| []                         |
+----------------------------+
1 row in set (0.00 sec)
```
```
mysql> update companies
set client_registration_fields =
'[{"key":"first_name","required":true},{"key":"last_name","required":true},{"key":"email","required":true},{"key":"phone","required":false},{"key":"password","required":true},{"key":"name","required":false},{"key":"website","required":false},{"key":"address1","required":false},{"key":"address2","required":false},{"key":"city","required":false},{"key":"state","required":false},{"key":"postal_code","required":false},{"key":"country_id","required":false},{"key":"custom_value1","required":false},{"key":"custom_value2","required":false},{"key":"custom_value3","required":false},{"key":"custom_value4","required":false},{"key":"public_notes","required":false},{"key":"vat_number","required":false}]'
where account_id = 1;
```

### Screenshots
<!-- If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. -->

### Logs
<!-- Please check the log files (storage/logs/) and provide redacted output -->
```

title: Totals are different in overdue invoices list view vs. edit/detailed view (rounding error)
body:
I am attaching two examples.

For invoice 484 the total is 140$ before taxes, total should be $160.97 once both taxes are added GST (5%):  $7.00, QST (9.975%): $13.97. On the list view the total is correct, on the detailed view it indicated one cent difference ($160.96).

For invoice 479 the total is 1140$ before taxes, total should be $1310.72 once both taxes are added GST (5%):  GST (5%):  $57.00 QST (9.975%): $113.72. On the list view the total is correct, on the detailed view it indicated one cent difference ($1310.72).

I haven't checked if this also happens for regular (not overdue / already paid) invoices as there wasn't a total displayed at the moment I created them (apparently now possible through custom fields).

title: German date format
body:
Hello,

I've just installed invoice ninja and it's awesome except for the Date Format.
The German date format is dd.mm.yyyy which is not available. There is one with the month written out (10/March/2013), but the month is still in English even though I set the language to German.

Is there anyway I can get a German date format?

Thank you for your help.

title: Email signature not rendering properly
body:
**What version of Invoice Ninja are you running? ie v4.5.25 / v5.0.30**
v5.1.25-C44

**What environment are you running?**
Docker

**Have you checked log files (storage/logs/) Please provide redacted output**
n

**Have you searched existing issues?**
y

**Have you reported this to Slack/forum before posting?**
n

**Describe the bug**
Multiple line email signatures appear as single line in email. 

**Steps To Reproduce**
Set email signature in email settings screen.


Example:
```
Thank you for your business,

My Name
Company Name
Phone Number
Email
```

**Expected behavior**
Email signature appears as you typed in email settings screen when email invoices.

**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

title: # hex / hashtag special character bugs out some areas
body:
Having the # character in an email seems to bug out the preview window. All text until the first # will appear and all text after will not. However, the actual email sent out is fine. I tried entering this as &23 and `#` in the Raw window then updating but the issue in preview still persists.

The other area I noticed is in the client's address fields as it is commonly used in local addresses. If # is the first character used in the field. It omits the symbol, in the Statement and Invoice screen. It also gives that address line an non-regular font size (bigger than the other address lines).

The work around is the place it at the back of the first address line, or place some other part of the address in front of the #.

title: Import OFX - Unexpected token
body:
Hello,
Thanks for this great invoice tool.

Since update to 4.1.2 I can't import OFX file (from /bank_accounts/import_ofx). Log says : Uncaught SyntaxError: Unexpected token ;

And the browser go to /bank_accounts/create without any message.

Could you please help me?

title: Gateway Fees under $1 not showing
body:
**What version of Invoice Ninja are you running? ie v4.5.25 / v5.0.30**
v5.1.62

**Describe the bug**
If a gateway fee is calculated to be less than $1, it is not added to the charge, although the user is still told that there will be a gateway fee on the previous page.

**Steps To Reproduce**
Using stripe's fees of 2.9% + $0.30, for example, if you create an invoice for $23 or less, the gateway fee is not included, but for $24 or more, there is a gateway fee.

In either scenario, the user is still shown the gateway fee in the "Pay now" dropdown button from the client portal, but not on the actual payment processing page.

**Expected behavior**
If the charge is $1 for example, I expect to see a $.33 fee, otherwise the user should not be shown a message stating that there will be a fee when there is not.

title: Payments not sorting
body:
<!-- Before posting please check our "Troubleshooting" category in the docs: 
https://invoiceninja.github.io/docs/self-host-troubleshooting/ -->

## Setup
- Version: Latest
- Environment: Docker, unRAID

## Interface
- React: []


## Checklist
- Can you replicate the issue on our v5 demo site https://demo.invoiceninja.com or https://react.invoicing.co/demo?
- Have you searched existing issues?
- Have you reported this to Slack/forum before posting?
- Have you inspected the logs in storage/logs/laravel.log for any errors?

## Describe the bug
Sorting data by any column header on the Payments tab is not working. Clicking on some column headers results in a "blink" like the table is re-sorting but the list does not actually change. Other times clicking on column headers results in perceivable action. I do not see this issue in other tabs like invoices, expenses, etc.

Sorting based on column header

```

title: Double terms and conditions on new install
body:
I just installed a fresh copy locally for testing.

I noticed that there are privacy and terms and conditions checkboxes on the install screen where you input db/smtp details etc, but it doesn't look like that is saved anywhere.
When you log in after a successful install you get a modal popup asking you to accept the terms/privacy again.

I'm assuming they are the same but didn't read them :)

title: Calendar Icon doesn't work under "mark paid" for expenses
body:
I tested it under Linux and Windows with Firefox.

Nothing happens when I click on the calendar icon that appears when I tick "mark paid" on an expense. The calendar icon under "date" however works perfectly fine with expenses.

I checked the html source and Firefox showed that one has an event bound to it and the other doesn't.

title: Infinite loading on payment selection for v2 payment links
body:
## Setup
- Version: v5.8.1-C147
- Environment: Docker

## Checklist
- Can you replicate the issue on our v5 demo site https://demo.invoiceninja.com or https://react.invoicing.co/demo? No
- Have you searched existing issues? Yes
- Have you reported this to Slack/forum before posting? No
- Have you inspected the logs in storage/logs/laravel.log for any errors? Yes. Nothing

## Describe the bug
When using a payment link (v2) to buy something, selecting the payment type results in an endless loading loop with the following error in the Chrome console:

```
v2:273 Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'submit')
```

### Steps To Reproduce
Use a v2 payment link, register as a new client, click on the button according the payment type wanted.

### Expected Behavior
Continue de payment flow and show the payment info window to the customer

### Screenshots
![SCR-20240105-nrcq](https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/assets/5446230/052c3669-869b-4285-8942-c6d6f6903109)

title: Error upon saving recurring invoice
body:
Version: 5.0.34-28

I have set up a number of recurring invoices. The previous two were fine.
The third one generated this error when I saved it:
```
500: SQLSTATE[23000]: Integrity constraint violation: 1048 Column 'auto_bill_enabled' cannot be null (SQL: insert into `recurring_invoices` (`status_id`, `discount`, `is_amount_discount`, `po_number`, `number`, `footer`, `terms`, `public_notes`, `private_notes`, `date`, `due_date`, `partial_due_date`, `is_deleted`, `line_items`, `tax_name1`, `tax_rate1`, `tax_name2`, `tax_rate2`, `custom_value1`, `custom_value2`, `custom_value3`, `custom_value4`, `amount`, `balance`, `partial`, `user_id`, `company_id`, `frequency_id`, `last_sent_date`, `next_send_date`, `remaining_cycles`, `client_id`, `tax_name3`, `tax_rate3`, `auto_bill`, `auto_bill_enabled`, `due_date_days`, `updated_at`, `created_at`) values (1, 0, 0, ?, ?, Please note you may need to set up automatical billing again., ?, ?, ?, 2020-12-10, ?, ?, 0, [{"product_key":"Domain Name Registration","notes":"Domain renewal","cost":175,"quantity":1,"tax_name1":"","tax_rate1":0,"tax_name2":"","tax_rate2":0,"tax_name3":"","tax_rate3":0,"custom_value1":"REDACTED.se","custom_value2":"","custom_value3":"","custom_value4":"","discount":0,"type_id":"1","createdAt":1607573681737000,"is_amount_discount":false,"sort_id":"0","line_total":0,"date":""}], ?, 0, ?, 0, ?, ?, ?, ?, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 10, ?, 2021-07-07, -1, 13, ?, 0, optout, ?, 14, 2020-12-10 04:15:40.214616, 2020-12-10 04:15:40.214616))
```

The only two things I did differently on this invoice is I put some text into the Footer, and I set the automatic billing to `Enabled by default`. On the other two there was no footer, and I set the automatic billing to `Enabled`.

After dismissing the error, I changed the Automatic billing to `Enabled`, and I was able to save the invoice without the error occurring.

title: Bug: Invoice link goes outside container bounds on email template preview
body:
I note that when viewing preview of Templates & Reminders (Invoice, in this instance), if the URL is inserted into the email template, in the preview it doesn't display well. Goes outside the bounds of its container.

See:

In some tasks.

title: Missing variable $client.website in PDF creation. BUG.
body:
All comments below are based off a client that actually has a website value saved in your client address book.

If you make a custom invoice template and use the variable `$client.website` you will not get the clients website as expected when sending the invoices or viewing invoices through the client portal.

Any invoices you create or view in the admin dashboard however will display the `$client.website` correctly. It appears that not all the variables, or at least `$client.website`, is not being created/ exposed for use in the client portal.

title: Fix issue with Modern invoice template which causes the Balance Due amount to have its last digit cut-off.
body: Changed value of width to 530 from 515 for the "rect" type in the canvas. The value was too small at 515 which caused the "balance due" amount to cut off the last digit.

title: Footer hides content on custom designs (even when there is no line edited)
body:
**What version of Invoice Ninja are you running?**
fresh from today (but bug is already there)

**What environment are you running?**
Self Hosting (white label), snappdf with chromium

**Describe the bug**
If I use a standard design, the page breaks at the right point, so the footer is viewed right. 
But if I use any custom design, even when there is no line customized (so only created with e.g Plain), the page breaks at the bottom of the page and the footer hides the content. 

I searched for an answer for hours but found nothing that works. Several fresh installations did not bring any effect.

**Screenshots**
standard design: Plain
![Bildschirmfoto 2022-01-15 um 17 12 15](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/58289195/149629000-a571d610-b949-49f2-a807-a92934596b12.png)

custom design: Test (with Plain - no line edited)
![Bildschirmfoto 2022-01-15 um 17 13 46](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/58289195/149629041-05e42bd2-5ff8-4d3c-ad7a-a030cfcccf11.png)

title: v5: Editing a v4 migrated expense then Change the tax to "By amount" issue
body:
Hello,

Hosted service
The issue happens in the Web version as of today and the Desktop version v5.7.54-W151 as well

Step to reproduce:

When I edit an "old" expense migrated from v4, then,
Changing the "Taxes" radio button from "By Rate" to "By Amount"
![image](https://github.com/invoiceninja/ui/assets/47455886/d1261c76-2f88-43e1-b8e7-a84efa38d9a0)

It will add $1 for 3 taxes even if only 2 taxes is the default setting (in Settings -> Tax Settings -> Expense Tax Rate: "Two Tax Rates"

From:
![image](https://github.com/invoiceninja/ui/assets/47455886/3155e5fb-bc9b-4a3b-8a97-5142129287c8)

To: 
![image](https://github.com/invoiceninja/ui/assets/47455886/372a0a58-1b2e-41bd-8851-8e56e1231950)

The same in Desktop version (currently v5.7.54-W151)
![image](https://github.com/invoiceninja/ui/assets/47455886/c1fbc80a-eb77-44a6-957e-4703f1bfa5f4)


The issue does not seem to happen when creating new expenses

Very tricky bug when you only have two taxes set up since you cannot see or find where this added dollar comes from until you activate the Three Taxes for expenses.

Patrick from Connexium

title: Fresh install web setup wizard broken again as of  v5.3.70 - Database authentication bug
body:
**What version of Invoice Ninja are you running? ie v4.5.25 / v5.0.30**
 v5.3.70

Attempted to set up a fresh v5.3.70 install and noticed that I could not set it up via the web setup because upon attempting to proceed after entering database credentials, it errors and appears to not be using the user that I enter and instead just tries with the user "ninja".

In other words, it doesn't appear to be trying to connect to the DB with the credentials that are entered.

VIDEO: https://youtu.be/hE5RjHokXyw

![issue](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52687659/158823320-bec26d71-a81c-4fb9-a2c8-247d1cf9b93c.png)

title: Please add indication that invoice URL has been copied to clipboard in client portal
body:
@beganovich 
when you copy an invoice link from the client portal with this button, there is no indication that it's been copied:
![Screenshot 2024-01-21 204851](https://github.com/invoiceninja/ui/assets/95985011/ef5a7f5a-6b05-4647-bfee-9348de2724d6)

In the react admin portal, whenever something is copied, it shows a nice clear indication of that, for example:
![image](https://github.com/invoiceninja/ui/assets/95985011/05ade7fe-93a9-4ef5-bc19-b4825c7e3695)

Please make the copying of invoice URL from the client portal also show an indication that it has been copied.

title: the sorting for recurring invoices
body: docker inst v5.11.33: Unfortunately, no longer works correctly. Example: Due date ASC See screenshot.

title: Quote can be approved with blank signature
body:
If you have signatures turned on for quotes, the customer is presented with the signature box.

If the customer leaves the signature box blank and clicks "Next Step", the quote is approved even if they did not scribble a signature.

There is no "required" check for the signature box so it's possible to proceed without actually signing/entering any signature in the box.

v5.4.10

title: Bug: Date in Expenses
body:
Hi,
When I try to edit an expense, date is replaced by current day.
PS: Using french localisation.

Thanks :)

title: Invoice subtotal is calculated incorrectly
body:
It appears the Invoice Subtotal field is calculated by summing each line item's unrounded amount.
This can result in a subtotal amount that does not total the rounded line item amounts, which it should.

see attached screenshot of invoice screen, where subtotal shows $6,325.40, but if you sum each rounded line item amount you would get $6,325.41.

$6,325.41 would be the expected and correct result for the subtotal.

![Screen Shot 2020-09-16 at 22 12 23](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/306426/93415696-b7600800-f869-11ea-90b6-2dc38b9ed400.png)

title: Custom Invoice invoice hidding public-notes / terms broken
body: ## Setup - Version: v5.11.22 - Environment Shared Hosting ## Interface - React: [X] ## Describe the bug I updated invoice ninja today (from 5.11.8) and now my custom invoice is broken. I use [data-ref="total_table-public_notes"] { display: none } [data-ref="total_table-terms-label"] { display: none } to hide the left of the total fields, which doesn't work anymore. See attached screenshots of an invoice (before / after) If i look at the html, it looks like the nodes are outside of the hidden element. ![editor](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/2f86b368-8856-4933-b143-8cd0638d4e6f)

title: V5 Recurring invoices - After stop, not start again
body:
**What version of Invoice Ninja are you running? ie v4.5.25 / v5.0.30**
v5.0.56

**What environment are you running?**
ZIP

**Have you checked log files (storage/logs/) Please provide redacted output**
yes - empty

**Have you searched existing issues?**
yes

**Have you reported this to Slack/forum before posting?**
yes - no response

**Describe the bug**
When a recurring invoice is stopped, the "stop" button is not switching to a start button.

It can always happen that a user click on "stop" but should be able to start again.

The start option is only available by creation, not when started and stopped after.

**Steps To Reproduce**
Create a new recurring invoice, save and click on start.

Next click on stop.

The button won't switch back to "start", it stays on "stop".

**Expected behavior**
Button is switching allowing to start/stop recurring invoices.

**Screenshots**


**Additional context**
Add any other context about the problem here.

title: Bug: 4.4.2 - Reoccurring Invoices No Longer Send.
body:
After the upgrade from 4.3.1 to 4.4.2 none of my reoccurring invoices will send.

When I view the reoccurring invoice and click "Email Invoice" it gives me an error that the invoice is not scheduled to send.

Also the "Start Date" no longer shows up. However, the start date is in the database for that invoice.

I have to save the reoccurring invoice, which then tells me it is updating the Starting Date from Blank to the current date, and then it will send.

However, I don't want to lose my history.

It looks like the starting dates for all of my reoccurring invoices are no longer loading, but are still correct in the database.

This is a pain to have to load an invoice, save it, email it, then edit the database to put the original starting date back.

NOTE: After I save the invoice and allow it to change the starting date to today, when I load that reoccurring invoice the data does then appear. However after I edit the db and put the original date back it no longer appears.

Could there be a JavaScript validation error here that is invalidating anything prior to today?

title: New Install: When clicking on "invoices" or "quotes" menu, drop down for client doesn't allow to select a client
body:
## Setup
- Version: v5.0.30 
- Environment: Docker

## Checklist
- Can you replicate the issue on our v5 demo site: NO
- Have you searched existing issues? YES

## Describe the bug
On a brand new install, I've added 2 new Clients. Afterwards, going to Invoices or Quotes menu, in the "Client" dropdown the 2 new clients appear, however when attempting to select either one of them, the the dropdown closes and "Please select a client" message appears underneath the input in red, with the input box being empty. Interestingly, it does allow to properly select a client in the "New task" section. Also clicking on a client "view statement" button on a client results in "/api/v1/client_statement? 500 response" in the console, in addition getting a 500 response when going into "settings" -> "invoice design" throws https://client.testcompany.com/api/v1/preview? 500 error. I've tried Chrome, Firefox, Opera, as well as the Phone app. They all fail the same way. 

This is an error that appears in browser console when attempting to generate an invoice:

Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'w')
    at Object.xl (main.foss.dart.js?v=5.5.55:74624:22)

title: [Question/Bug] Product Data Visualization shows wrong balance?
body:
Data visualization of products shows red circles with equal total and balance, even though I only have one invoice which is fully paid. Client and Invoice visualization correctly shows a green circle.
Is this a bug?

title: When creating a new expense from a transaction the "Inclusive Taxes" toggle is ignored + Amount is negative
body:
## Setup
- Version: v5.8.23-C147
- Environment: Docker

## Interface
- Flutter: []
- React: []
- Both: [x]

## Describe the bug
In the settings under expense settings you can set the default setting for new Expenses created. You can set if by default a new expense sets the "Inclusive Taxes" toogle to on or off. This setting is respected when creating a new expense on the Expenses page but not if a new expense is created via the Transactions page.

This can lead to confusion.

Additionally, the amount that is set in the new expense is negative. It would be nice if it could be absolute.

### Expected Behavior
Respecting the configured default setting and transferring the amount from the transaction to the new expense as a positive number.

title: The company and the client from another account are displayed in the customer portal
body:
<!-- Before posting please check our "Troubleshooting" category in the docs: 
https://invoiceninja.github.io/en/self-host-troubleshooting/ -->

## Setup
- Version: <!-- i.e. v4.5.25 / v5.0.30 --> v5.11.68
- Environment: <!-- Docker/Shared Hosting/ZIP/Other --> Docker

## Interface
- Flutter: []
- React: x
- Both: []

## Checklist
- Can you replicate the issue on our v5 demo site https://demo.invoiceninja.com or https://react.invoicing.co/demo? no
- Have you searched existing issues? yes
- Have you reported this to Slack/forum before posting? yes
- Have you inspected the logs in storage/logs/laravel.log for any errors? yes

## Describe the bug
<!-- A clear and concise description of the bug. -->
In the statements tab from client's customer portal, which does not yet have any invoice, the company and the client from another account are displayed.

### Steps To Reproduce
<!-- Please list the steps to reproduce the issue. -->
1. Create a second company (there must be at least two accounts)
2. Create a new client for this company
3. Go to its customer portal and to the statements tab

### Expected Behavior
<!-- A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. -->
The details of the company to which the client belongs and the details of the client visiting the portal should be given.

## Additional context
<!-- Add any other context about the problem here. -->
After the first invoice for this client has been issued, the data starts to be displayed correctly. In theory, the client should only see the portal after receiving the first bill, but this is nevertheless a data leak from another account and should be fixed.

### Screenshots
<!-- If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. -->

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e965ec35-0e16-4b0b-92b8-d8ca37b00f5b)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/bfb62d61-0625-46dc-b69d-9a7b28ea3bb6)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b2079dbb-6bd5-4023-911d-41fec2ad0de4)

### Logs
<!-- Please check the log files (storage/logs/) and provide redacted output -->
```

```

title: [Bug] Some dates are always displayed in UTC
body: `Utils::dateToString()` does not respect the user's timezone setting. Therefore, any caller of `Utils::dateToString()` is returned a date string in UTC. I first noticed this when the wrong dates were shown for Invoice Sent/Viewed and also when the wrong dates were shown in Invoice Email History, but it looks like there are currently 9 callers of `Utils::dateToString()` in the project. I've attached a screenshot showing how the wrong date is displayed in Invoice Email History: I will submit a PR for this shortly.

title: Timer display (javascript) on task page measures time slower
body:
1. Create timer task
2. Hit start
3. Wait 10 minutes
4. Notice timer display is at 5 minutes
5. Refresh page
6. Notice it shows 10 minutes like it should

Browser: Chrome, OS: Linux

title: [Bug report?] Client Expenses
body: I'm running 4.4.2 and I've added a couple of expenses through the expenses section and assigned them to a client then invoiced the client. But when I pull up the client's details and click on the expenses section under the client I don't see the expenses listed there so I have no way of tracking expenses by client. Am I misunderstanding how to use the expenses section or did I set something up wrong?

title: Client Statement Payment Method When Using Paypal Showing Manual
body:
When we run the client statements under the payment "Method" it shows correctly for Credit Card, Cash, Check, but for for the ones paid online via "PayPal Express" it shows "Manual entry"  What is looks like in the system VS on the statement for reference. https://imgur.com/a/IImZXh3

Also can the "Transaction Reference" be added to the client statements so they can see the Check or PayPal reference numbers?

title: Task Tax Column Does not hide when empty
body:
## Setup
- Version: 5.7.45
- Environment: Docker

## Interface
- Flutter: []
- React: []
- Both: [X]

## Checklist
- Can you replicate the issue on our v5 demo site https://demo.invoiceninja.com or https://react.invoicing.co/demo?
  - Yes
- Have you searched existing issues?
   - Yes
- Have you reported this to Slack/forum before posting?
   - No
- Have you inspected the logs in storage/logs/laravel.log for any errors?
   - Yes

## Describe the bug
When the Tax field for one of the products is filled in, the task rate does not hide the tax rate column.

### Steps To Reproduce
Set the invoices to hide columns when empty, in settings. Then create an invoice where atleast one product has taxes and a task does not.

### Expected Behavior
The tax column in tasks does not show up if none are present.

### Screenshots

title: Issue with Proposal Design Tool / GrapesJS
body:
Hello to all,

I tried use the Proposal design tool. I'm not sure is it just me or what, does anyone here aware it's super buggy and almost unusable?

I try create Template and Snippet. Set the styling, Cell Width, Font Size, Cell BG colour, once satisfied, Save It.

When try to use the Snippet at Proposal creation, the nightmare happen. All of the Styles in Snippet GONE!

I tried with Template and Snippet, both have same problem, nicely design and styled and in the end, it cant be use because of the styling is totally out.

Also, the image upload, by default is it preset to image dimension larger than 400px not allow upload?

I try upload image, it only allow me to upload small images below 400px. I try upload images with dimension 100px, 200px, 300px, 400px and 500px.

Images with width 100px to 300px can be upload without problem. But image of 400px and 500px or anything image over this size, the upload never show the thumbnail and upload never success.

I wonder anyone else having the problem that I have? Please advice, thank you.
